name: Virtual Vacation Zone
description:
This game is... a weird memoir documenting various memories I have relating to vacations and trips I've gone on throughout my life. With gameplay inspired by Animal Crossing: Amiibo Festival (seriously). You are encouraged to share your own memories as well for other players to see (if you choose to submit anything, that is).

Virtual Vacation Zone was made for Nicole He's VACATION-themed stream from July of 2021. While I decided on a mood I wanted to portray in the game, I didn't actually have any gameplay ideas until very last minute. I'm not sure exactly where the final product came from but I'm weirdly proud of it. It's not a full narrative experience like Extreme Tax Masters, but instead it's something completely different.

Gameplay Tipz

The gameplay is hopefully self explanatory? Just click or press space to advance through things.
